commands.description: Toss a coin, heads or tails. (Fun fact: there's a 1/6000 chance of a coin landing on its edge.)
Get information on the bot and how to use the bot.

commands.usage:
/info bot
/info channel
/info emoji <emoji>
/info role
/info server
/info user
commands.example:
/info bot
/info channel
/info emoji :emoji:
/info role
/info server
/info user
commands.description:
Get Beldum Bot's information.
Get the selected channel's information
Get a custom emoji's information and image.
Get the selected role's information and image.
Get the server's information and images.
Get the selected user's information and images.
Random number generator that rolls a random integer between two inputted integers (inclusive)
Play rock paper scissors with the bot.
